creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: full length portrait of a man wearing white and holding a white cowboy-style hat; three suitcases on his left with another hat on top of one of them; pink background; thin white metal frame
provenance: The artist, Los Angeles; (Miles McEnery Gallery , New York, sold to Mersky, Nov. 2017); Robert B. Mersky, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
text: The work Christian, 2013, from the artist’s latest series portrays day laborers hired off the street, a visible but often politically underrepresented group. The work retains the figurative distortions of Sonsini’s earlier career, but offers a more empathetic approach to portraiture. The subjects are often taken out of their usual environments and placed on abstract backgrounds alongside props that relate to their cultural identity and migratory existence.
title: Christian
